title: JIPMER Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Nursing Officer, Technician and Other Posts
description: The Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education & Research (JIPMER) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Nursing Officers, Technicians, and Data Entry Operators. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their GNM, B.Sc Nursing, B.Sc., and Diploma can apply for the JIPMER Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode...
